001package io.jstach.rainbowgum.disruptor;
002
003import io.jstach.rainbowgum.LogConfig;
004import io.jstach.rainbowgum.LogProperties;
005import io.jstach.rainbowgum.LogProviderRef;
006import io.jstach.rainbowgum.LogPublisher.PublisherFactory;
007import io.jstach.rainbowgum.LogPublisher.PublisherProvider;
008import io.jstach.rainbowgum.LogPublisherRegistry;
009import io.jstach.rainbowgum.annotation.LogConfigurable;
010import io.jstach.rainbowgum.spi.RainbowGumServiceProvider;
011import io.jstach.rainbowgum.spi.RainbowGumServiceProvider.Configurator;
012import io.jstach.svc.ServiceProvider;
013
014/**
015 * Registers {@link DisruptorLogPublisher} to the default
016 * {@link LogPublisherRegistry#ASYNC_SCHEME} which makes it the default async publisher
017 * provider. Disruptor Log Publisher will also be registered to the
018 * {@link #DISRUPTOR_SCHEME}.
019 */
020@ServiceProvider(RainbowGumServiceProvider.class)
021public class DisruptorConfigurator implements Configurator {
022
023        /**
024         * The URI scheme for the DisruptorLogPublisher
025         */
026        public static final String DISRUPTOR_SCHEME = "disruptor";
027
028        /**
029         * No-Arg constructor for ServiceLoader.
030         */
031        public DisruptorConfigurator() {
032        }
033
034        @Override
035        public boolean configure(LogConfig config, Pass pass) {
036
037                enum DisruptorProvider implements PublisherProvider {
038
039                        INSTANT;
040
041                        @Override
042                        public PublisherFactory provide(LogProviderRef ref) {
043                                return (name, config, appenders) -> {
044                                        return new DisruptorLogBuilder(name).fromProperties(config.properties(), ref) //
045                                                .build() //
046                                                .create(name, config, appenders); //
047                                };
048                        }
049
050                }
051                config.publisherRegistry().register(LogPublisherRegistry.ASYNC_SCHEME, DisruptorProvider.INSTANT);
052                config.publisherRegistry().register(DISRUPTOR_SCHEME, DisruptorProvider.INSTANT);
053
054                return true;
055        }
056
057        /**
058         * Default size of disruptor ring buffer.
059         */
060        public final static int DEFAULT_BUFFER_SIZE = LogPublisherRegistry.ASYNC_BUFFER_SIZE;
061
062        @LogConfigurable(prefix = LogProperties.PUBLISHER_PREFIX, name = "DisruptorLogBuilder")
063        static PublisherFactory of(@LogConfigurable.KeyParameter String name,
064                        @LogConfigurable.DefaultParameter("DEFAULT_BUFFER_SIZE") Integer bufferSize) {
065                return DisruptorLogPublisher.of(bufferSize);
066        }
067
068}
